name: δ^W\_μ
label: μ-Weitzenböck operator
definition: μ-weighted Weitzenböck operator encoding μ-dependent deviation of a connection.
correction\_term: C\_μ(Γ) depends on δμ and μ⊗; it vanishes when μ is constant.

constraints.torsion\_compatibility: Must be compatible with μ-δ-torsion T\_μ.
constraints.locality: C\_μ(Γ) depends only on local μ and δμ.
